headline: Is Apollo Global Management (APO) Pricing Reflect Long Term Gains After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Apollo Global Management's share price still reflects solid value or if expectations have run ahead of reality, you are in the right place. The stock last closed at US$136.31, with returns of 5.3% decline over 7 days, 8.4% decline over 30 days, 7.0% decline year to date, 19.7% decline over 1 year and a 102.6% gain over 3 years, plus a 232.3% gain over 5 years. These mixed shorter and longer term returns have put more attention on what is driving sentiment around...
